Events that occurred on 4 February

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1933 - C.S. Lewis writes to lifelong friend Arthur Greeves about The Hobbit.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien's poem "The Dragon's Visit" is published in The Oxford Magazine.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 22.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 214a.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 321.
2006 - Previews of The Lord of the Rings (musical) open in Toronto.
